about_the_game:
Enter the Guns of Icarus universe through the eyes of a young William Aven as he comes of age and is about to begin his own adventure in the skies!

The setting is Cathedral City in the midst of a international trade conference. A place where paths connect and divulge. Where William meets many possible destinies and, for this demo, the meeting of a young Fjordlander noblewoman named Gwynevere.

This is only a small excerpt of the Cathedral Story from the main game.
detailed_description:
Enter the Guns of Icarus universe through the eyes of a young William Aven as he comes of age and is about to begin his own adventure in the skies!

The setting is Cathedral City in the midst of a international trade conference. A place where paths connect and divulge. Where William meets many possible destinies and, for this demo, the meeting of a young Fjordlander noblewoman named Gwynevere.

This is only a small excerpt of the Cathedral Story from the main game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enter the Guns of Icarus universe through the eyes of a young man coming of age and about to begin his own adventure in the skies! This demo is a brief glimpse of the Cathedral Story arc and the heroines which could change his fate.
